name: A Goddamn Miracle: American Gods, “The Bone Orchard” | Tor.com

content.html: I totally agree with this review of the first episode of American Gods. It was, in many ways, a triumph! What seemed unfilmable has started off with an impressive bang. Now, can it sustain its strong start? I sure hope so.
content.value: I totally agree with this review of the first episode of American Gods. It was, in many ways, a triumph! What seemed unfilmable has started off with an impressive bang. Now, can it sustain its strong start? I sure hope so.
